header.banner: currently looking for a new position :-)

home.title: "Swiss army knife" software engineer
home.p1: Hello, I am Arnaud Dupont, a French software engineer working on full-stack dev, validation-support and project management.
home.p2: I can work at all the stages from the requirements analysis to the validation phase, just as well in small or large companies.
home.p3: I am always looking for new projects, in or out my expertise field. Feel free to contact me for position offers, prestation needs or just a hand.

resume.title: resume
resume.p: Here are my resume and my portfolio of competences.  Those include only my most significant projects. If you have any doubts, do not hesitate to contact me : I don't bite (unduly).

legal.p1: This website does not use or collect any personnal data (no cookies). If you have any questions, you may contact the editor.
legal.p2: As a remider, in case of abusive collect or use of your personnal data, you have rights and can complain to the local autorities (Cnil).
